 SELECT DISTINCT LIS.Work_Book, LIS.Work_Sheet FROM

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT ERROR_COUNT,
  CASE WHEN ERROR_COUNT = 0 THEN 'SUCCESS'
  ELSE 'FAIL'
  END RUN_STATUS,
  CASE WHEN ERROR_COUNT = 0 THEN NULL
  ELSE 'Not all Excel sheets have been loaded with no error'
  END COMMENT_MSG
  FROM (
       SELECT SUM(ERROR_COUNT) ERROR_COUNT FROM (
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
			 UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Contract_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
			 UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Incident_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Operation_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
			 UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Related_Party_Transaction_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
			 UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Sales_Other_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Strategic_Project_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
)x
)z

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	CurrentPeriod as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Risk_Sub_Class as string,
		Risk_Class as string,
		Risk_Description as string,
		Actions_and_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as string,
		Likelihood as string,
		Severity as string,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as string,
		Eliminate_or_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as string,
		Residual_Severity as string,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as string,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> NewRecords
NewRecords select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDeleteKeys
SelectDeleteKeys derive(Current_Reporting_Period = toTimestamp($CurrentPeriod, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn1
Aggregate1 alterRow(deleteIf(uniquecount>0)) ~> AlterRow1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Current_Reporting_Period),
	uniquecount = count(0)) ~> Aggregate1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID_Old as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as short,
		Severity as short,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as short,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as short,
		Residual_Severity as short,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as short,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Quarterly_Incidents as integer,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Risk_Opp_Class as string,
		Risk_Opp_Sub_Class as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period = Current_Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelationalDelete

		Budget_Sales_Costs as decimal(10,2),

DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,

	uniquecount = count(0)) ~> Aggregate1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
ExcludeBlankTextResponseNumericResponse derive(PrimaryKeysValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period) || isNull(UID) || isNull(Answer_Number), "Asset or Fund or UID or Answer Number cannot be blank/", ""),
		TextAndNumericResponseValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Text_Response)) && not(isNull(Numeric_Response_ToDecimal)), "Only one of Text Response or Numeric Response can have value", ""),
		NumericResponseValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Numeric_Response)), iif(not(isNull(toDecimal(Numeric_Response))),"", "Numeric Response must be a number"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',PrimaryKeysValidateMsg, TextAndNumericResponseValidateMsg, NumericResponseValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response = Numeric_Response_ToDecimal,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(PrimaryKeysValidateMsg,TextAndNumericResponseValidateMsg,NumericResponseValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && not(isNull(Asset_ID)) && not(isNull(Fund_ID)) && not(isNull(Reporting_Period)) && 
( not(isNull(UID)) || not(isNull(Attribute)) || not(isNull(Answer_Number)) || 
not(isNull(Text_Response)) || not(isNull(Numeric_Response_ToDecimal)) )) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
FilterBlankAssetFund select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Answer_Number = iifNull(toInteger(Answer_Number), 1),
		Numeric_Response_ToDecimal = toDecimal(Numeric_Response, 19, 4)) ~> DateTypeTransform
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset filter(not(isNull(Asset_ID)) && not(isNull(Fund_ID))) ~> FilterBlankAssetFund
ExcludeFirstRow filter(not(isNull(Text_Response)) || not(isNull(Numeric_Response_ToDecimal))) ~> ExcludeBlankTextResponseNumericResponse
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset sink(input(
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Asset_Id as string,
		Fund_Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Asset_Id = Asset_ID,
		Fund_Id = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OpsWorkbookWorksheetList
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as integer,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectKeyColumnsForDelete
SelectKeyColumnsForDelete aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod
AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Contract_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Execution_Date as string,
		Termination_Date as string,
		Contracted_Party_Company_Name as string,
		Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract as string,
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Type_of_goods_or_services as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Execution_Date as date,
		Termination_Date as date,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as decimal(19,4),
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Contract_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[Execution_Date]\n      ,[Termination_Date]\n      ,[Company_Name]\n      ,[Contract_Value]\n      ,[Contract_Currency]\n      ,[Contract_Type]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity1]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity2]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity3]\n      ,[Insert_Datetime]\n      ,[Contract_ID]\n FROM [relational].[OPS_Contract]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalContractLkp
LookupContract derive(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Contract_ID),"Null Contract ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Contract_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Contract ID not belong to Asset/"),""),
		ContractValueValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract), "Invalid Contract Value/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg,
ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg,
ContractValueValidateMsg)) == 0 && equals(Validation_Flag, "1"),
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg, ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg, LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg, ContractValueValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
not(isNull(Asset_ID)) && not(isNull(Fund_ID)) && not(isNull(Reporting_Period)) && 
(not(isNull(Contract_ID)) || not(isNull(Execution_Date)) || not(isNull(Termination_Date)) || 
not(isNull(Contracted_Party_Company_Name)) || not(isNull(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract)) || not(isNull(Contract_Currency)) || 
not(isNull(Type_of_goods_or_services)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_1)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_2)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_3))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
FilterBlankAssetFund select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Execution_Date = toDate(Execution_Date),
		Termination_Date = toDate(Termination_Date),
		Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract = toDecimal(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract, 19, 4),
		Contract_ID = toInteger(Contract_ID),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Harvest_Unit as string,
		Harvest_Operation_Type as string,
		Product as string,
		Species as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as string,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as string,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Predicted_Revenue as string,
		Predicted_Stumpage as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Fees_Levies_etc as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Cartage as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Harvesting as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Other as string,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation as string,
		Actual_Revenue as string,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Cartage as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Harvesting as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Other as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Operation_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Operation_Type_Code]\n      ,[Operation_Type]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Operation_Type]\nWHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOperationType
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n FROM [relational].[OPS_Species_Type]\n WHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalSpeciesType
LookupSpeciesType derive(OperationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Operation_Type_Code_Lkp), "Operation Type/", ""),
		SpeciesTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), "Species Type/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',OperationTypeValidateMsg, SpeciesTypeValidateMsg)) == 0 && equals(Validation_Flag, "1"),
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Code = Product,
		Species_Code = Species_Code_Lkp,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation = Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(OperationTypeValidateMsg,SpeciesTypeValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type = Harvest_Operation_Type,
		Product,
		Species,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && not(isNull(Asset_ID)) && not(isNull(Fund_ID)) && not(isNull(Reporting_Period)) && 
(not(isNull(Harvest_Unit)) || not(isNull(Harvest_Operation_Type)) || not(isNull(Product)) || 
not(isNull(Species)) || not(isNull(Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit)) || not(isNull(Actual_Harvest_Commencement)) || 
not(isNull(Predicted_Harvested_GMT)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Fees_Levies_etc)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Cartage)) || 
not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Harvesting)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Other)) || 
not(isNull(Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation)) || not(isNull(Actual_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Actual_Harvested_GMT)) || not(isNull(Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area)) || 
not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies)) || not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Cartage)) || not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Harvesting)) || 
not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance)) || not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Other))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset

		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit = toDecimal(Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit, 19, 4),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT = toDecimal(Predicted_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4),
		Predicted_Revenue = toDecimal(Predicted_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Predicted_Stumpage = toDecimal(Predicted_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement = toDate(Actual_Harvest_Commencement),
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation = toDate(Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation),
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area, 19, 4),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4),
		Actual_Revenue = toDecimal(Actual_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Cartage, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Harvesting, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Other = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Other, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Cartage, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Harvesting, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Other = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Other, 19, 4)) ~> DateTypeTransform

		Operation_Type_Lkp = Operation_Type

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string ("2020-08-28T06:05:53.4181322Z"),
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Incident_Type as string,
		Category as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Incident_Type_Code\n      ,Incident_Type\n  FROM relational.OPS_Incident_Type\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOpsIncidentType
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Incident_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Asset_ID\n      ,Fund_ID\n      ,Reporting_Period\n      ,Incident_ID\n  FROM relational.OPS_Incident',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalIncident
LookupIncidentType derive(IncidentTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Incident_Type_Code_Lkp), "Incident Type/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		IncidentDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Incident_Date), "Certification End Date/", ""),
		ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Incident_Id),"Null Incident ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Incident_ID_Lkp)),iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Incident ID not belong to Asset/"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg,
IncidentTypeValidateMsg,
IncidentDateValidateMsg,
ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg)) == 0 && equals(Validation_Flag, "1"),
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(IncidentTypeValidateMsg, IncidentDateValidateMsg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg,LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && not(isNull(Asset_ID)) && not(isNull(Fund_ID)) && not(isNull(Reporting_Period))) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
FilterBlankAssetAndFund select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Incident_Id = toInteger(Incident_Id),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Incident_Date = toDate(Incident_Date),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOpsIncidentType select(mapColumn(
		Incident_Type_Code_Lkp = Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Type_Lkp = Incident_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIncidentTypeLkp
LookupIncidents, SelectIncidentTypeLkp lookup(Incident_Type == Incident_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Incident_Type_Code_Lkp, false),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIncidentType
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalIncident select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Incident_ID_Lkp = Incident_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIncidentLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectIncidentLkp lookup(Incident_Id == Incident_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIncidents
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset filter(not(isNull(Asset_ID)) && not(isNull(Fund_ID))) ~> FilterBlankAssetAndFund
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(

		Incident_Severity,

		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,

		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

	),

	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(

	),

		ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Certification_ID),"Null Certification ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

parameters{

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as short,
		Expected_Completion_Date as date,
		Planned_Completion_Date as date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as short,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Project_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[Primary_Management_Activity]\n      ,[Project_Objectives]\n      ,[Expected_Value_Impact]\n      ,[Deliverable]\n      ,[Project_Weighting]\n      ,[Expected_Completion_Date]\n      ,[Planned_Completion_Date]\n      ,[Current_Progress_Perc_Complete]\n      ,[Insert_Datetime]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Strategic_Project]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalStrategicProjectsLkp
LookupStrategicProject derive(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Project_ID),"Null Project ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Project_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Project ID not belong to Asset/"),""),
		PlannedAndExpectedCompletionDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date) || isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date), "Invalid Planned or Expected Completion Date/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg,
ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg,
PlannedAndExpectedCompletionDateValidateMsg)) == 0 && equals(Validation_Flag, "1"),
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg, ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg, LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg, PlannedAndExpectedCompletionDateValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && not(isNull(Asset_ID)) && not(isNull(Fund_ID)) && not(isNull(Reporting_Period)) && 
(not(isNull(Project_ID)) || not(isNull(Primary_Management_Activity)) || not(isNull(Project_Objectives)) || 
not(isNull(Expected_Value_Impact)) || not(isNull(Deliverable)) || not(isNull(Deliverable_Project_Weighting)) || 
not(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date)) || not(isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date)) || not(isNull(Current_Progress_Percent_Complete))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
FilterBlankAssetFund select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Expected_Completion_Date = toDate(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date),
		Planned_Completion_Date = toDate(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date),
		Project_Weighting = toShort(Deliverable_Project_Weighting),
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete = toShort(toDecimal(Current_Progress_Percent_Complete, 3, 2) * 100),
		Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_or_Export as string,
		Species as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency as string,
		Month as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Production_Cost as string,
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Species_Type]\n  WHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalSpeciesType
source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Sales_Unit_Code\n      ,Sales_Unit\n  FROM relational.OPS_Sales_Unit\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalSalesUnit
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Price_Point_Code\n      ,Price_Point\n  FROM relational.OPS_Price_Point\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDeliveryPoint
LookupPricePointFromDeliveryPoint derive(SpeciesTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), "Species/", ""),
		SalesUnitValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp), "Sales Unit/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		DeliveryPointValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Price_Point_Code_Lkp), "Delivery Point/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,
SalesUnitValidateMsg,
DeliveryPointValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) == 0  && equals(Validation_Flag, "1"),
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export = Domestic_or_Export,
		Product = Product_Type,
		Delivery_Point_Code = Delivery_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code = Currency,
		Sales_Month = Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Unit_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code = Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp,
		Species_Code = Species_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,
SalesUnitValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
DeliveryPointValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export = Domestic_or_Export,
		Species,
		Product = Product_Type,
		Delivery_Point_Code = Delivery_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Unit,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code = Currency,
		Sales_Month = Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Unit_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && not(isNull(Asset_ID)) && not(isNull(Fund_ID)) && not(isNull(Reporting_Period)) && 
(not(isNull(Customer)) || not(isNull(Domestic_or_Export)) || not(isNull(Species)) || 
not(isNull(Product_Type)) || not(isNull(Delivery_Point)) || not(isNull(Price_Point)) || 
not(isNull(Sales_Unit)) || not(isNull(Sales_Quantity)) || not(isNull(Average_Sales_Price)) || not(isNull(Sales_Revenue)) || 
not(isNull(Production_Cost)) || not(isNull(Stumpage)) || not(isNull(Unit_Stumpage)) || not(isNull(Currency)) || 
not(isNull(Month)) || not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Quantity)) || not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Budget_Production_Cost)) || 
not(isNull(Budget_Unit_Stumpage))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
FilterBlankAssetFund select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Sales_Quantity, 19, 4),
		Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Production_Cost = toDecimal(Production_Cost, 19, 4),
		Stumpage = toDecimal(Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Average_Sales_Price = toDecimal(Average_Sales_Price, 19, 4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Budget_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Production_Cost, 19, 4),
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Budget_Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Price_Point = toDecimal(Price_Point, 19, 4),
		Month = toDate(Month)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalSpeciesType select(mapColumn(
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Species_Lkp = Species
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSpeciesTypeLkp
LookupSalesUnit, SelectSpeciesTypeLkp lookup(Species == Species_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSpeciesType
RelationalSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp = Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Lkp = Sales_Unit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesUnitLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectSalesUnitLkp lookup(Sales_Unit == Sales_Unit_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSalesUnit
RelationalDeliveryPoint select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code_Lkp = Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point_Lkp = Price_Point
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPricePointLkp
LookupSpeciesType, SelectPricePointLkp lookup(Delivery_Point == Price_Point_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupPricePointFromDeliveryPoint
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset filter(not(isNull(Asset_ID)) && not(isNull(Fund_ID))) ~> FilterBlankAssetFund

		Total_Units_Sold,
		Total_Revenue,
		Total_Sales_Costs,
		Total_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,
		Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,

		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,
		Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg,
		ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DataTypeTransformations keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(and (RowNumber > 1, not(isNull(Sales_Type)) || not(isNull(Sales_UOM))||not(isNull(Sales_Point))||not(isNull(Total_Units_Sold))||not(isNull(Total_Revenue))||not(isNull(Total_Sales_Costs))
||not(isNull(Budget_Units_Sold))||not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue))||not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Costs)))) ~> ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Total_Units_Sold = toDecimal(Total_Units_Sold),
		Total_Revenue = toDecimal(Total_Revenue),
		Total_Sales_Costs = toDecimal(Total_Sales_Costs),

		Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue),
		Budget_Sales_Costs = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Costs)) ~> DataTypeTransformations
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',

	),

SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(input(

		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Sale_Type as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	),

SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset sink(input(
